en: Are you going to eat pizza?
example: Are you going to eat pizza for lunch?
Is she going to study tonight?

en: Are we going to play games?
example: Are we going to play games after school?
Is he going to travel next week?
Are they going to sing at the party?

en: Are you going to learn English?
example: Are you going to learn English soon?

en: Are we going to meet him?
example: Are we going to meet him at the station?

en: Is she going to buy a new phone?
example: Is she going to buy a new phone this month?
Are they going to move next month?

en: Are you going to watch the show?
example: Are you going to watch the show this weekend?

en: Is he going to cook dinner?
example: Is he going to cook dinner tonight?

en: Are we going to study together?
example: Are we going to study together after class?

en: Is she going to take the test?
example: Is she going to take the test tomorrow?

en: Are they going to bring gifts?
example: Are they going to bring gifts to the party?

en: Are you going to go shopping?
example: Are you going to go shopping this afternoon?
